content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a cause that has been ongoing for 4 years and 6 months it involves a husband and wife who are going through a divorce and are disputing the division of assets the judges decision emphasizes the role of the notaryliquidator in resolving disputes and facilitating the distribution of assets the decision states that disputes regarding leased property and claims for advances should be addressed through judicial proceedings and fall within the notarys purview the court has ruled that the liquidation distribution must be temporarily interrupted and may involve third parties in the proceedings the court also grants the wife an advance share of the partition the costs of the legal proceedings are to be borne by the parties involved
